conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with clear isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and interior volume rendering. Minimal perspective distortion observed.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in room adjacencies and wall placement. Balcony and utility areas are accurately maintained.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D plan precisely, including kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. Interior spaces are highly legible.

detected_errors.description: Inner door swing directions are slightly exaggerated in 3D compared to the floor plan arc.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact geometry, furniture layout, and proportions of the original floor plan.
